item.title: BlenderFusion: 3D-Grounded Visual Editing and Generative Compositing
item.description: A framework merging 3D graphics editing with diffusion models for precise, 3D-aware visual compositing, useful for synthetic data generation.

item.title: YOLOv5
item.description: State-of-the-art YOLOv5 model for object detection available on PyTorch Hub, supporting custom training and inference.

item.title: Intro to Autoencoders
item.description: A tutorial introducing autoencoders with examples including image denoising and anomaly detection on ECG data.

item.title: Dynamic SOLO (SOLOv2) with TensorFlow for Better Understanding Computer Vision
item.description: A practical approach to instance segmentation using SOLOv2 and TensorFlow, serving as a powerful alternative to YOLO for custom object and defect detection.

item.title: Watershed Segmentation Using OpenCV
item.description: A comprehensive technical guide on using the watershed segmentation technique in OpenCV, applicable for industrial inspection and defect localization.

item.title: Lunar Crater Detection: Computer Vision in Space
item.description: Demonstrates training a computer vision model using synthetic data generated with three.js, relevant for synthetic defect generation workflows.

item.title: How to Improve the Performance of Visual Anomaly Detection Models
item.description: Practical guide on improving visual anomaly detection models using techniques like image resizing, center cropping, and background removal, with references to Anomalib and PatchCore.
